sqlMap.select: SELECT t2.id, t2.title, t2.singer, t2.song_file FROM td_mp3_album_song t1, v_td_mp3_song t2 WHERE t1.is_deleted = '0' AND t1.song_id = t2.id AND t1.album_id = #album_id# ORDER BY t1.no desc
SELECT t.id, t.title, small_image, big_image FROM v_td_mp3_album t WHERE t.publish_time < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ORDER BY t.no desc

SELECT t1.id course_id, t1.title, a1.file_path, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM td_user_course a2 WHERE a2.course_id=t1.id AND a2.is_deleted='0') count_user FROM td_course t1 LEFT JOIN td_file a1 ON a1.is_deleted = '0' AND t1.img_file_id = a1.id, td_user_course t2 WHERE t1.is_deleted = '0' AND t2.is_deleted = '0' AND t1.id = t2.course_id ORDER BY t1.no desc

SELECT t1.id, t1.title, t1.content_type, t1.publish_time, a1.file_path small_file_path FROM td_disc_article t1 LEFT JOIN td_file a1 ON a1.is_deleted = '0' AND t1.small_img_id= a1.id WHERE t1.is_deleted = '0'
exists (select 1 from td_disc_article_key b1 where b1.key_id=#key_id# AND t1.id= b1.article_id)
AND t1.publish_time < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ORDER BY t1.publish_time desc limit #offset_begin#,#offset_end#

SELECT t1.*, a1.file_path filmimg_file_path, a1.file_type filmimg_file_type FROM td_disc_article t1 LEFT JOIN td_file a1 ON a1.id = t1.filmimg_file_id AND a1.is_deleted = '0' WHERE t1.is_deleted = '0' AND t1.id = #id#
